Package etomica.space1d

Class Orientation1D

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.space1d.Orientation1D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOrientation

    public class Orientation1D
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOrientation
    Orientation in a 1-dimensional space. Only two values are possible, indicating one of two directions. Value of orientation is given as +1 or -1.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Orientation1D​()
      Construct with default orientation of +1.
